knimeNode.name: Strings To Document
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts the specified strings to documents.

fullDescription.intro: Converts the specified strings to documents. For each row a document will be created and attached to that row. The strings of the specified columns will be used as title, authors, abstract, full text and so on.

ports.dataIn: An input data table containing string cells.
ports.dataOut: An output table containing the strings of the data of the input table as well as the created documents in an additional column.
